Here is some setup code that should be hidden when rendered:

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.width=3, fig.height=3)
```

```{r}
x<-3
y<-4
x
y
```

Some display math

$$
x = \frac{3}{4} 
$$

Some inline r code x is `r x` and y is `r y`
